review: We visited this Hospital related to my child health issue. Doctor was good. I am satisfied with the treatment given.  I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. There was no waiting time when I went.  I can rate the doctor 5 out of 5, 5 being highest. Hospitality was good. My child had fever and cold. We did blood test in hospital.

We had visited the hospital and it was health problem for my son. Treatment was fine. I am satisfied with the treatment given.  I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. Waiting time was for 30 minutes.

Visited Dr Sagar Bhattad after our Pediatrician referred him.. My kid's feet were swelling only at night and after going through all the tests, we were sent to Dr Bhattad. Nothing was wrong in the tests taken till then. From the moment he started examining my kid, all he was saying was my kid is "highly attention seeking" and that my kid "is doing this to skip school" and that this kinda swelling is nothing and asked me to try how he manages his pain when I give him gadgets; again saying that I am pampering my kid a lot and he is seeking attention and faking the pain!!At last, WHEN WE TOOK HIS vit D, we have come to know that my kid indeed has VIT D defici.** ***** ** ******* ***** **** *** ****** ** ******* **** ** **** **** ** *** *** **** ***** *** * ****** ** *********** ******* * ****** ** ********* ***** *** ***** **** *** *** ** ***** ** *** *** *** ***** * ******* ********** * ****! Never ever steppin into Aster again!!t
I consulted for my daughter who had fever. Doctor was very nice, ** **** **** ********** I can recommend the doctor to my family and friends. There was some waiting time to consult the doctor.
